items.sentence: I get tired of hearing Tom talking about Mary.
Would you mind helping me carry this suitcase?
You can do it yourself if you choose to do so.
Tom told me he doesn\'t want to work with you.
You know I don\'t need to do that, don\'t you?
Tom bailed on us just when we needed him most.
Tom believed Mary when she said she loved him.
Tom believed that what Mary told him was true.
He\'s likely to pass the entrance examination.
I have a couple of questions I\'d like to ask.
